name: Vegetable Flavors Garlic Extract (23-0042-NA)
description: Nactarome Garlic Extract (23-0042-NA) is a high-quality natural flavoring ingredient that is oil soluble and perfect for enhancing the garlic flavor in your food products. It is allergen-free, halal, kosher and sustainably produced making it a versatile ingredient for various food applications, including fats and oils.
